sdgs.relevance:
The African Storybook webpage itself (https://www.africanstorybook.org) demonstrates that the 3696 storybooks and the 7586 translations are relevant to the Quality Education SDG. 
There are also reviews of ASb at:
https://www.alllanguageresources.com/african-storybook/
https://allafrica.com/stories/202202110011.html - this review stresses the importance of quality storybooks in indigenous languages which is one of the features of ASb

A published research article on ASb can be found here: https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/modl.12374

The Scale of Solution details indicate all of the educational organisations that ASb works with

Judith Uchidiuno has also reviewed several of the books on her Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/people/African-Storybook-Reviews-Judith-Uchidiuno/100055884440164/
